alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 9:48PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Red Chute Bayou At Sligo affecting Bossier and Bienville Parishes. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Red Chute Bayou At Sligo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Overflow will begin to affect the small mobile home park in the Sligo community just south of the Sligo-Caplis highway. Also expect flooding of farmland in southern Bossier Parish between Red Chute Bayou and the Flat River. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 32.2 feet. - Forecast...Red Chute Bayou at Sligo Road crested near 33.1 feet Friday Evening. A slow fall is forecast to continue through next week. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued Sunday Morning at 1000 AM CDT.
